comments.body: The number of active sessions for a backend server is given by the value of `scur` in [HTTP state checks](https://www.haproxy.com/doc/aloha/7.0/haproxy/healthchecks.html#checking-a-http-service).

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +339,343 @@        state = tuple(
            map(
                lambda d: {'status': d['status'], 'weight': d['weight'], 'scur': d['scur']},
                filter(lambda d: (pxname is None or d['pxname'] == pxname) and d['svname'] == svname, r)
            )

comments.body: I went with this flat style, since it reads better to me here than a nested conditional.
